attributes.comment:
I am writing to protest the increased and repetitive fees for adoptive children's
applications. With the increased time it takes to adopt from foreign countries
most parents have to apply twice. We as adoptive parents are already dealing
with huge costs. Many parents have drained their savings trying fertility
treatments. Due to our government's inabiltiy to provide equitible health care and
no insurance coverage these costs are completely out of pocket. Next these
financially drained families turn to adoption. They then have to pay huge
expenses with no governmental or personal insurance assistance. Many do not
adopt within country because of the deplorable adoptive laws in this country.
Please do not add to the stress and burden of these families by increasing the
fees over 140%. Please make a special concession for adoptive families. These
are people that merely want to make a family and by doing so help out some of
the most vulnerable citizens of the world...orphaned children. Thank you for your
time and attention
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Bonnie Elozory
